Review.Contenu: I sent Topup on 23rd September, I was told that something was wrong  topup not sent, yet my payment was not returned to my bank account.

Review.Titre: More Money Applied to Taxes Versus Number of Minutes
Review.Contenu: I feel in paying for anything, the taxes should not be more than what you are receiving. While this is a cheaper service to put minutes on the phone versus a monthly plan, there should be more money in taxes than the number of minutes the customer is paying.

Review.Titre: I have never received a coupon despite…

Thought i could trust you people seems i was wrong so please fix this .  please fix this , i signed up to your website and i do not have a order number  but y’all got my email so please respond so this can be sorted out

I tried contacting regarding an error made and wanted to know if it could be corrected. I emailed the email address provided on the site and yet to hear back regarding my inquiry. Would’ve been nice to receive an email response advising if my request was possible instead of no reply. Poor customer service!Update: please note I receive a response yes but it had nothing to do with my actual email inquiry. I wouldn’t have mentioned had I got a response. I do appreciate you responding and providing me an answer to my email now. Thank you!

I am giving you guys bad review. Because I buy minutes all the time for my mother in Jamaica and apparently I didn’t click the right add minutes to my mothers phone in Jamaica it was so inconvenient for me since the reason was an emergency to hear from my mom the next day. The rep couldn’t help to put the minutes to the right plan or complete the correct transaction I was so disappointed in the service I don’t think I want to keep using you guys anymore.

I rate this service as bad because the recipient has not received the funds to their phone, this is the second time this has happened.I put funds on a phone before & it was never received so never used this service for a long time but as the person needed some voice minutes I tried this service again only to get the same outcomeThey took my money & never provided the goods twice now ....needless to say I will not be using their service again

Review.Titre: Because of errors in the system I ended…

So far, so good. I never have a problem.

Your website was very good, but lately something is wrong. If you have names and numbers stored and you try clicking on one of the names it keeps scrolling. When it does work  it's taking way too long to process the transaction.
Every time i use this means of sending top up it takes the money fron my card instantly and the person on the other hand doesn't receive their top up until hours after.......  Unacceptable

Review.Titre: The costumer service was rule I ask why …
Review.Contenu: The costumer service was rule I ask why did they charge my phone twice that was my child lunch money and he told me that he couldn't refund the one payment that wasn't supposed to be taken off my card and he also stated if I would to contact my bank account that I will get kick off telephone jamaica .com so I never ever been disrespected the way I did with this representing ok I understand but you all should have an option where some have away to concel if a mistake is made no you don't tell a person they are lost out there money then threatened them if they call the there bank that THEY will deleted there account I didn't put all worker down just one one Apple spoil the whole group And for you to come to me handling things in this matter I am very very upset I am a faith customer I would like the same respect that I Give you have the recorder of our message listen to it enjoy your day

Extremely awful call quality, which was choppy, distorted, crossing of lines, cutting in & out, & moreover, when I as a new customer brought these details to Telephone Jamaica's, (CSR's), to resolve fairly & accordingly...  All they did was deflect, obfuscate, dismissive behavior, non-receptive, & in further, gave me nothing but a series of ethical fallacies, rationale fallacies, & rhetorical fallacies, & deliberately failed to be accountable & responsible @ all levels.  Predominantly, this is a high way ripp-off, of an entity, & which is very deeply troubling, & despicable in its entirety.  & as such, I will not spend a red cent with this entity going forward, & as such, I would urge all new & existing customers to be mindful in the now, & going forward etc.  And might be reporting this particular entity to a few high powered government, & watch-dog entities, as a result etc.Jah, will make it right etc!!!Jason

It's okay if you don't want to go to the deli to by a phone card. At the deli a $2 phone card gives you anywhere from 10-15  minutes , this card gives you just under 8 minutes.  Holding back just enough cents so you would be back to add more .

Telephone Jamaica provides a well administered service and its facilities are easy to use. However, the charge rate for calls to Jamaica is much too high when compared to charge rates for calls to many other parts of the world.

Service is usually quite quick, and response to requests regarding problems/issues are also surprisingly fast. The different payment amounts from small to larger amounts provide good opportunity to choose from the various options

Review.Titre: I send $20 in mobile upcharge and we…
Review.Contenu: I send $20 in mobile upcharge and we sometimes only get to talk a few minutes a day, if that and then it expires before the month is over with. It's not worth the money I spend, but it is the only way we can talk.

Review.Titre: Calls drop sometimes and whenever make…

I enjoys using this website. The only issue I have is with the phone card. Whenever, the card is about to finished the line starts breaking up, then the operator disconnects the call.The operator need to tell customers when they have one minute left, instead of chipping in after the card finished.I need an app for this website, tired of going on Google as soon as my card finished.

Review.Titre: there is a problem in your system
Review.Contenu: there is a problem in your system, the first time I set up my account and sent the reload, no problem, the second time the processing stayed in pending, a agent called me ask some questions, I ask would I have to do this everytime, she said no....third time it stayed in pending again, no one called , therefore I called, the put me on hold came back said all is well, he said it will not happen again....I will try a fourth time and see what happens

I have no problems with my order everything done to my satisfaction the only thing I'm concerned about is it was brought to my attention that if the recipient does not use the credit on their phone in a specific time then the credit is removed I think this is not right that Digicel cando this because I pay for the credit and recepient should use it however they choose

Review.Titre: I am grateful to our ALMIGHTY YAH that…
Review.Contenu: I am grateful to our ALMIGHTY YAH that I have access to affordable calling to call my Dad who lives in the Carribbean. I love that you can add Voice Credit from $2+ compared to other services that starts voice credit at $5. I also like the Top Up Feature which I've used to add credit to my Dad's International line. For which he was grateful and happy. :-) Hearing your loved ones on the other end of the line is Priceless. My appreciation for making TJ available. I gave 4 stars as I would love to see the Website Navigation simplified for the end user. SHALOM. Shalom.

It's a good service, however sometimes I keep getting calls that do not connect to the person I am trying to call but it still reduces my balance. That's really the only issue. They are pretty good at refunding me when I call to complain.

I always use one of the non local access number cause the local first two did not work.  I would suggest putting in a1 minute warning a before or something.  The calls just ends bad thing.  Great connection and I am please price is compareble to others.

Review.Titre: we use all the time to call europe...cheapest service!
Review.Contenu: Cheapest service from canada to ireland....we have been using for years...from time to time the connection is not great...one phone call and it improves...also have mild time delay, but you get that from other services as well...so great value for the price

I've tried numerous websites but got disappointments one after another. TelephoneJamaica.com is the best website for calling love ones any where in the world. They even offer services for text messages. I can recharge a family member's cell phone Digicel or Flow. No one else offers that service from Italy to Jamaica. What else could i ask for. It's fast and riliable. One thing though, local phone credit is being used at the same time. I hope it'll be upgraded to WIFI connections, this way only one payment will be made from my pockets. Thanks for offering such great services at such a reasonable price.

Review.Titre: Great service but ends abruptly when credit expires.
